subject: [Mhln] Loan for a low month payment
body:
Thank you for your loan request, which we recieved 
yesterdayWe'd like to inform you that we are accepting your application.
We are ready to give you a $272,000 loan (Approved refinance) for a 
low month payment. Approval process will take only 1 minute. Please visit the 
confirmation link below and fill-out our short 30 second form. http://kzheswthbrushes.com
